## agenc cron logs

View output logs from the most recent cron run

### Synopsis

View the Claude output logs from the most recent run of a cron job.

Use -f/--follow to tail the log file in real-time.

Example:
  agenc cron logs daily-report
  agenc cron logs daily-report -f


```
agenc cron logs <name> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --follow   follow log output (like tail -f)
  -h, --help     help for logs
```

### SEE ALSO

* [agenc cron](agenc_cron.md)	 - Manage scheduled cron jobs
